title: Profile Insignia next season
body: About the profile insignia, if I place gold in solo/duo and platinum in flex 5v5s, what color would my profile insignia be? Is it based on highest rank between those two?

replies.body: Hmmmmm I'm guessing your highest rank would be shown, but I'll have to confer with my game peeps on this one.
Did you found out anything, if so please let me know.

I don't think there's any specifics on this season, but I've been able to scavenge some information from others posts on the board, and I've found this in particular:

> Loading Screen Borders
Part of your season rewards package is a loading screen border. Your new border will be visible once you receive your ranked rewards. There are a few new queues this season, so hereâ€™s where your borders will appear:
Ranked Solo/Duo - 2016 Dynamic Queue
Ranked Flex 5v5 - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s (not available until Patch 6.23)
Ranked Flex 3v3 - 2016 Ranked 3s (not available until Patch 6.23)
Normal Summoner's Rift - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s
Normal Twisted Treeline - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 3s
Co-op vs. AI Summoner's Rift - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 5s
Co-op vs. AI Twisted Treeline - Best of 2016 Dynamic Queue or Ranked 3s
Custom - Best of any 2016 queue
Rotating Game Modes - Best of any 2016 queue
ARAM 5v5 - Best of any 2016 queue

Source: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/FEar7ZOT-how-do-borders-work-in-different-ranks?comment=000000000000
Though I realise this might not help much since it takes stuff from Dynamic Queue which doesn't exist anymore. Sorry if it's not much of a help.
